nodes.title: Fix build in ant as well as eclipse
fix android mode arc mode lack feature

Permit custom renderers that extend PGraphicsOpenGL

Core AndroidX support and creation of distributions for JCentre
Add support of Kotlin/Native and Upgrade Gradle Build System to Kotlin DSL in processing-android

Proposal to fix push/pop matrix op in default mode.

Wait for emulator to complete booting

Merging Gradle migration changes from Rupak
merge changes in Services API and permission handling
Added open and close functionality of Soft keyboard

create cardboard library folder if it doesn't exist
Added support to build project with gradle
Prevent memory leak keeping closed AndroidEditors in memory
Fixes: loadJSONObject and loadJSONArray are missing #189.
PApplet does not extends anything now same as java mode.
Fixes crash while automatically selecting the SDK

File locations in commandline build script
Use name of the SDK as the key to distinguish different SDKs

Download API level 22 SDK by default

ignore in case the api level is less than 11
